心理预植物可以显着增强手术后的康复加州大学洛杉矶分校健康（UCLA Health）的外科医生领导的一项新分析发现，心理预植物可以显着增强手术后的康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/psychological-prehabilitation-can-simincimatifation--enhance-recovery-recovery-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/psychological-phelmabilitation-can-simincimatifation--enhance-recovery-recovery-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46033485-8090-4A16-BFF7-89B431B9CD76 Mon, 17 Mar 2025 13:26:45 -0400 Psychological prehabilitation can significantly enhance recovery after surgery
国会议员指责特朗普团队结束了远程医疗保险的福利。那不是很正确。众议员Ro Khanna（D-Calif。）于2月20日发布了一段Tiktok视频，称他对远程医疗访问的Medicare覆盖范围的命运有“突破新闻”，这使患者可以从他们家中远程查看医疗保健提供者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/congressman-blames-trump-team-for-dend-team-dend-telehealth-medicare-medicare-benefit-thate-thate28099s-not-quite-right.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/congressman-blames-trump-team-for-dend-telem-telehealth-telehealth-medicare-medicare-benefit-thate-thate28099s-not-quite-right-right.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d553259-6E0D-4C8B-B375-41B75-41B7DCF125FD Mon, 17 Mar 2025 13:06:43 -0400 Congressman blames Trump team for ending telehealth Medicare benefit. That’s not quite right.
手术减少轻度睡眠呼吸的儿童的医疗访问根据美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）支持的临床研究，手术清除扁桃体和腺样体的扩大（SDB）似乎会大大降低该组医疗办公访问和处方医学使用的频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/surgery-redergery-reduces-health-care-visits-in-care-care-children-with-mild-sleep-sleep-disordered-breahath.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/surgery-reduces-health-care-visits-in-care-care-care-children-with-mild-sleep-sleep-sleep-disordered-breahthing-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50DA5CE1-440F-457B-8B-8BC7-3D471127D20C Mon, 17 Mar 2025 13:03:23 -0400 Surgery reduces health care visits in children with mild sleep-disordered breathing

研究表明尿酸作为中风的附加疗法的潜力在一项临床前研究中，用尿酸治疗的啮齿动物显示出急性缺血性中风后的长期结局改善。研究结果表明，该治疗可能是对人类标准中风治疗的附加疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-shows-potential-of-ric-ric-acid-acid-as-as-add-ond-on-therapy-for-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250317/study-shows-potential-of-potential-of-eric-acid-acid-acid-as-add-on-on-therapy-for-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33c940f1-CF74-4E21-B043-C5D1997F5E4A Mon, 17 Mar 2025 12:54:17 -0400 Study shows potential of uric acid as add-on therapy for stroke
